Emergency & Civic Helplines

Need help or want to report a civic emergency? Here are verified helpline numbers you can reach out to:

Municipal Complaints

Report garbage, potholes, streetlight issues, and sanitation problems

📞 155304

Water Supply Issues

Leakage, pipeline bursts, and drinking water complaints

📞 1916

Electricity Complaints

Power cuts, exposed wires, faulty streetlights

📞 1912

Animal Rescue / Stray Help

Injured animals, stray menace, animal cruelty

📞 1962

Fire & Rescue

Fire emergencies and rescue operations

📞 101

Police Control Room

Any suspicious activity, crime reporting

📞 100

Women Helpline

Support for women in distress or unsafe environments

📞 1091

Swachh Bharat Helpline

Cleanliness drives, sanitation requests, public toilets

📞 1969

Verified government helplines. Availability may vary by region.
